description: Welcome to my cosy bright studio.  Here you will find a comfortable lounge, with TV (HBO and Netflix), a queen bed in the next room separated by french doors, and a small kitchen and bathroom.  You are a five minute walk from the 2,3,4,5 express trains at Franklin Ave.  Crown Heights is a neighborhood full of diverse and amazing food, coffee and shopping.  Also a short walk to Brooklyn Museum and Prospect Park.  A perfect base for exploring New York!
name: Bright Architect's Studio in Vibrant Crown Heights
review: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
